sequence:
Avrora and Her Jovial Friends

<size=45>Chapter 7: The Light of Dawn</size>

scripts.say: Heheh, Saratoga's cannon bombardment is nothing to scoff at!
I told you I needed an escort because I couldn't defend myself, but... woah!
Indeed, it would be a fatal mistake to go into battle without an escort.
I'm not too proud of it, but I used to conduct this type of operation against the Sirens' large-scale fleets.
Operation...?
Yes, this is what we're best at here in the Northern Parliament. Everyone, I've located the enemy commander! Forward!!!
Through the smoke and flames where the Eagle Union was exchanging fire with the Northern Parliament, a figure clad in white came charging towards them at surprising speed.
That's... Sovetskaya Rossiya!!
Entering range in 3... 2... 1... And, that's checkmate.
And thus, the Eagle Union flagship was "sunk," resulting in a victory for the Northern Parliament.
Waahh, I'm so sorry, we lost because of me...
No, I am also to blame. I completely got caught up in their diversion.
Well, that was only possible because you only sent one battleship. If we were up against your entire task force, there's no way we'd be able to pull off something like this.
Yes, if Saratoga had another battleship protecting her, Avrora and I would not have been so lucky.
Breaking through the enemy's weak point, identifying their leader, and taking them out in a single decisive strike... this must have been a strategy you optimized to fight the Sirens.
Ahaha! This sure brings me back. Avrora, what was the purpose of this exercise?
Well, let's see...
For the Northern Parliament, seeing carrier-centric operations was a good learning experience. Right?
Indeed. Results aside, the tactical advantages offered by a carrier task force are evident to me.
In any case, we harbor no ill will against the Eagle Union. If you all feel the same way about us, then...
I hope that this exercise was a good way to deepen our trust, develop bonds, and help us both take the first step towards a brighter future together. I think that you'll agree~â™ª
So how about it? Let's get together this evening to further strengthen our new bonds.
All right!
Ahahaha! Bring out the good stuff for tonight!
Mm... I'm looking forward to it.
Sister Sara will come too!
...All right everyone, good work today. Let's enjoy ourselves at the party.
You're as wonderful as ever. Even though you aren't a commander, you're always guiding the children of the Northern Parliament.
Oh my. I'd say the same about you as a role model for the Sakura Empire.
All I do is just give them a little push on the back. You, on the other hand, are the "light of dawn" that illuminates their path.
Heheh, I'm flattered~
...And thus concluded her story, a tale of the coming of the light of dawn.
